revised_title: Microscopic Effects of Stress on Platinum: Observations on Crystalline Slip
tldr: This article examines the microscopic effects of stress on platinum, revealing the crystalline slip and disintegration of the metal's structure under compression. The findings contribute to understanding the behavior of platinum under stress and its comparison with other metals like copper, nickel, iron, and steel.
scientific_discipline: Materials Science > Mechanical Properties of Materials
